name: XCTIssueReference.IssueType
desc: Constants that indicate types of test failures, such as assertion failures, performance regressions, or thrown errors.

items.name: case assertionFailure
items.desc: A test failure due to a failed test assertion or related API.

items.name: case performanceRegression
items.desc: A test failure due to a performance regression.

items.name: case system
items.desc: A test failure due to an internal failure in the testing framework.

items.name: case thrownError
items.desc: A test failure when the test throws an error in Swift.

items.name: case uncaughtException
items.desc: A test failure when code throws an exception and doesn’t catch it.

items.name: case unmatchedExpectedFailure
items.desc: A test failure due to an expected test failure that doesn’t occur.
